answers.answer:
The main purpose of the dopomoha.ro website is to provide information and support for people from Ukraine who want to request help from Romania.

To find this information on the website, go to the "Terms and conditions" page and look under the section titled "1. Objective of the Platform."

answers.answer:
Yes, Code for Romania processes personal data provided by users of the dopomoha.ro platform for support services dedicated to refugees, and this data is temporarily stored during the platform's operation.

To find detailed information, go to the dopomoha.ro website, navigate to the 'Terms and Conditions' section, and read points 2 through 7.

answers.answer:
Code for Romania will not provide personal data to third parties. However, data can be provided to institutions, public authorities, or other competent state bodies based on legal provisions and express requests.

To find this information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read under section "5. Transfer of Personal Data to third parties".

answers.answer:
Users on the Dopomoha.ro platform have rights including the right to information, access, intervention, rectification, deletion, portability, opposition, and restriction of their personal data. They can also address the National Supervisory Authority for the Processing of Personal Data or the judiciary for the defense of their rights.

To find detailed information, please go to the Dopomoha.ro website at https://dopomoha.ro/en/terms-and-conditions and read under the section "6. Your rights".

answers.answer:
Code for Romania uses state-of-the-art technologies and implements all reasonable technical measures to ensure the full security and confidentiality of personal data during transmission and storage. All personal data is stored and processed on servers located in the European Union, complying with European data protection legislation.

To find more detailed information, visit the dopomoha.ro website and navigate to the "Terms and Conditions" page. The specific details regarding security measures are outlined under section 7, titled "Security and Privacy."

One can contact Code for Romania regarding the dopomoha.ro platform or data privacy by email at contact@code4.ro. An address is also provided for contact.

To find this detailed information on the webpage, navigate to the "Terms and conditions" page and look under the "Contact us" section (Section 11). You can also find an email address for general questions at the end of the "Changes to the General Site Terms and Conditions of Use" section (Section 9).
